column4: anyone know how to get ac97 codec's working? I have tried to search for it with no luck :(
I just installed ubuntu yesterday and everything but the sound works just fine :(
strange... I've got only problems playing some old games
it's a headless machine that basicly I am using as a file server, so I am not certain if it's just the way that it was installed or whatnot.
the first one (I think it was dekstop), then I installed all the stuff I needed it to be a file server
So you would suggest re-installing the machine?
well, no... not nesecary I gues... but I use the alternateCD and have no problems, you've installed the server-installer?
no, the desktop, then installed all the server stuff (Was going to install the server but pressed the wrong button and just stuck with it)
I mean... I've installed the server-installer ones, then I installed ubuntu-desktop... I thought everything works/looks fine... but there were also no sound
hrm.... could try re-installing the machine, wouldn't take long, do you think it would fix my problem?
maybe you should ask someone else, most time when I'm here, I've got also problems/questions...
hope you will figured it out :)
